pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint from 0.35.0 to 0.36.1
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.35.0 to 0.36.1.
Changelog

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

0.36.1

  • Fix behavior of MD054

0.36.0

  • Improve MD051
  • Move applyFix and applyFixes from helpers to core
  • Make micromark parser available to custom rules
  • Introduce ./micromark helpers exports
  • Update custom/rule documentation
  • Improve performance
  • Update dependencies
Commits
  • 368cb1b Update to version 0.36.1.
  • a7a50ea Update MD054/link-image-style to handle autolinked email addresses when disal...
  • 3b07268 Bump ava from 6.1.3 to 6.2.0
  • d96bc9c Restore markdown-it script to browser demo to support "?renderer=markdown-it".
  • e708143 Update to version 0.36.0.
  • b4697d6 Rename GitHub issue template to make it the default for new issues.
  • 14a2756 Add a GitHub issue template with suggestions to improve issue quality (based ...
  • 16512bb Reorder operations in getDescendantsByType helper for ~1% runtime reduction.
  • e6e799d Reorder checks in filterByTypes helper predicate for ~2% runtime reduction.
  • d94b78e Refactor getEvents slightly to avoid modifying the MicromarkParseOptions object.
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.35.0&new-version=0.36.1)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Mobile Ads
AdGuard URL Tracking
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Annoyances
AdGuard Russian
```

pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint from 0.35.0 to 0.36.1
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.35.0 to 0.36.1.
Changelog

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

0.36.1

  • Fix behavior of MD054

0.36.0

  • Improve MD051
  • Move applyFix and applyFixes from helpers to core
  • Make micromark parser available to custom rules
  • Introduce ./micromark helpers exports
  • Update custom/rule documentation
  • Improve performance
  • Update dependencies
Commits
  • 368cb1b Update to version 0.36.1.
  • a7a50ea Update MD054/link-image-style to handle autolinked email addresses when disal...
  • 3b07268 Bump ava from 6.1.3 to 6.2.0
  • d96bc9c Restore markdown-it script to browser demo to support "?renderer=markdown-it".
  • e708143 Update to version 0.36.0.
  • b4697d6 Rename GitHub issue template to make it the default for new issues.
  • 14a2756 Add a GitHub issue template with suggestions to improve issue quality (based ...
  • 16512bb Reorder operations in getDescendantsByType helper for ~1% runtime reduction.
  • e6e799d Reorder checks in filterByTypes helper predicate for ~2% runtime reduction.
  • d94b78e Refactor getEvents slightly to avoid modifying the MicromarkParseOptions object.
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.35.0&new-version=0.36.1)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
It can't be checked without an account, so if you provide the credentials (test account) to filters@adguard.com, we can take a look at this.

> I've narrowed it down to Adguard annoyances filter: when enabled, the site does not load.
It will only load properly after also having disabled Adguard base filter

Which of the filters are responsible for this? Try to leave only Adguard Base, AdGuard Annoyances without any other modules and check the site.

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters. It's caused by `Fanboy's Annoyances`. You can disable it temporarily until the authour fixes it or add the rule below to user rules.
```adblock
@@/push-notifications.$~stylesheet,domain=weekend.ee
```

comment.body:
Здравствуйте. Не думаю, что стоит добавлять правила в общий фильтр, вот правила для пользовательского:
```
youtube.com##.loupe_banner
youtube.com##.cursor_banner
youtube.com##div[style*="base64"][style^="height: "]:not([class])
```

comment.body:
The issue is caused by third-party filter `ABPVN List`. Please, temporary disable this filter or add to the user rules:
```
toptruyenww.pro#@%#//scriptlet("abort-on-property-read", "setTimeout", "open")
```

@stephenhawk8054 Hello. Could you please take a look?

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://activitypub.ghost.org](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Factivitypub.ghost.org) ### Comment > The "Portal" script that all sites using the ghost.org publishing platform that allows members to manage their account is broken by AdGuard. > > This prevents people from managing paid subscriptions and subscribing/unsubscribing from newsletters. comment.body:
Disclaimer: I work for Ghost.

This block affects 10s of thousands of Ghost sites and their related businesses. The broken script is used purely for site and subscription related functionality, with no ads or popups outside of user-initiated actions.

If there's something particular about the script that can be changed to prevent this issue we're open to making adjustments. FWIW the script is open source, with the source files viewable at https://github.com/TryGhost/Ghost/tree/main/apps/portal
